bibl.title: Roman Officials in Judaea and Arabia and Civil Jurisdiction.

series.title: Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism.

bibl.title: Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert
bibl.author: COTTON, Hannah M.

bibl.note: [Introduction.] - 1. Roman office-holders and the dispensation of justice. - 2. The operation of the Roman judicial system and the Babatha archive. - 3. P. Yadin I, 14 and a case of iudex datus in the Babatha archive.
bibl.seg: COTTON Hannah M. and Werner ECK, Roman Officials in Judaea and Arabia and Civil Jurisdiction.
Ranon KATZOFF and David SCHAPS (Edd.), Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert = Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism. 96 (Leiden, 2005) pp. 24-44.
